name: Clown On The Loose!
description:
You play as a clown who wants to play a joke on his circus overlords. Equipped with you trusty balloons, you decide to free all of the animals from their confinement!

Controls

MoveArrow keysUse BalloonC keyRestart(Not implemented) must reload page

Note: Please note there is only a test level currently available to play. If the player gets crushed, he is in a "dead" state. However, you must reload the page to keep playing. 

Please understand 🙏
